snippet: The visiting Miami Heat’s B-squad clinched the best record in the N.B.A. with a 103-98 victory over the Wizards.
lead_paragraph: The visiting Miami Heat’s B-squad clinched the best record in the N.B.A. with a 103-98 victory over the Wizards.

headline.seo: Heat Clinch Best Record in the N.B.A.
